title: Home
body_text: Cross Cut Property Services provides professional lawn, shrub, garden and property maintenance as well as snow removal. Owned by Rick Zobel who has been in the industry since the early '90s this company is built on sensible solutions and their successful execution. As Rick is very industrious and knowledgeable in lawn maintenance and it's management he is able to simplify tasks and provide value in structuring a well defined plan for single family homes, multi-facility commercial properties, residential associations and government properties. Cross Cut Properties maintains equipment for large brush cut and wild growth maintenance as well as professional mowing, trimming and garden maintenance.
